body: Good god, how many more chapters must this go! (He's already got three good waifu's! Anymore then glasses girl here and the writer is fucking MILKING this to death! Would love a chapter where he fucks the harem at once....which is why I hate the story over expanding it past three, my usual good luck number with harems as I discovered, porn or manga, if the harem exceeds three! Four at BEST to be nice somewhat! It's not fun! I can take the Guy being a stud horse for alot of girls! But that's usually a single NON-chapter affair, not a chapter one like this!)
